Compare Perfect-fit Blinds

Measuring for Perfect Fit Blinds (Swift directblinds)

Our range of Verona 25mm Perfect Fit aluminium Venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home.  Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look.  Perfect Fit blinds are designed for use with a uPVC door and window as they are drill, and screw-free! At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this Perfect Fit Venetian blind made by our team of experts, but it also comes with a FREE five year guarantee.  Still not sure?  Why not take us up on our free sampling service, that way you can be sure your new blind is the perfect fit! Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Added Thermal Retention Due to Framework Light Filtering: Yes Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £15.76 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Perfect Fit Venetian Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Ash Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

A mid-grey shade, the Ash Grey 25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating grey headrail and a silver bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand. Perfect Fit Ash Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. pinkpink-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Infusion asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4137. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

greygrey-perfect-fitperfect-fit

The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Magnolia Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4126. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

Meadow Flower asc Spring Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Part of our Meadow Flower range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Meadow Flower asc Spring Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80012. An elegant, dim-out pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.

Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.

blackoutblackout-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Part of our Galaxy Blackout range, where Advanced Solar Control (ASC) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX6010. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.

whitewhite-blackoutwhite-blackout-perfect-fitwhite-perfect-fitblackoutblackout-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Hive Plain White Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Hive Plain White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Privacy non-Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.  Made to measure Hive Plain White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX71001. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal properties and increasing energy efficiency.

blackblack-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Infusion asc Saffron Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion asc Saffron Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Saffron Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4141. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this Perfect Fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your uPVC windows or doors. At Swift Direct Blinds quality is important to us, which is why your new Perfect Fit blind is hand-made with quality materials, in our Yorkshire workshop by our team of experts, and delivered direct to your door. Hive Blackout Barley Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Hive Blackout Barley Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Hive Blackout Barley Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72003. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

Hive Blackout Emerald Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Hive Blackout Emerald Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Hive Blackout Silkweave Elephant Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Part of our Hive Blackout Silkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Blackout Silkweave" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Hive Silkweave Blackout Elephant Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind, PX78004. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.

Measuring for Perfect Fit Blinds (Swift directblinds)

Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer. Featured here in our modern warm white colour - they're both attractive and stylish additions to your room. Made to measure from £29.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer. Featured here in our staple concrete grey colour - they're both attractive and stylish additions to your room. Product ID: SDB-PFP0152 Fabric Colour: Concrete Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Minimal Perfect Fit Framework - Easy Drill-Free Installation Clips     Control Type: Manual Tensioned Pull Handle Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Added Thermal Retention Due to Framework Light Filtering: Yes Cellular Concrete Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £29.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Pure Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame (Blinds By Post)

A brilliant white shade, the Pure White 25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any Anthracite uPVC window or door.  Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating white headrail and a colour co-ordinating white bottom bar. Perfect Fit Pure Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home!This lush green Perfect Fit roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure Perfect Fit blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our Perfect Fit blinds are drill-free, a great solution for fitting to uPVC windows and doors.At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This green Perfect Fit blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

beigebeige-acaciabeige-acacia-perfect-fitbeige-perfect-fitacaciaacacia-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

For a darker grey in your window the Hampton Grey Pleated is a superb option. The colour is not created in a block but rather created from a series of short strokes of mid-tone and darker greys, which layer into a deep grey fabric. Additional shading comes from the pleated ripples that create natural highlights and pooling shadows. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free installation in under 15 minutes. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit

greygrey-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this Hampton Dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free fitting. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit

Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

Create elegant shading in your window with the Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your Perfect Fit frame to your UPVC window for an integrated, cohesive look. The Cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors. The dimout style allows for some lightfall even when the blind is closed, to enable brightness alongside privacy. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, making it a great choice for conservatories which often have little wall space. Kingston Flint's stone-grey tone is a dappling texture in a dimout style, allowing gentle light levels to pass through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart Perfect Fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly. Struggling to cover your french doors?
